dmca.title: [ABUSE] COPYRIGHT AND TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT - signed fax to follow
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 03, 2005 3:25 PM
To: admin@topsecretrecipes.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] COPYRIGHT AND TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT - signed fax to
follow

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Top Secret Recipes <admin@topsecretrecipes.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, <copyright@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, March 1, 2005, 6:40:40 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] COPYRIGHT AND TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT - signed fax to follow

===8<==============Original message text=============== Blank

SIGNED FAX TO FOLLOW

March 1, 2005


Lance Crosby, Esq.
ThePlanet.com
Chief Operating Officer
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

VIA Fax: 214-782-7756



Dear Mr. Crosby;

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or
an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named Todd Wilbur ("IP Owner"). I have
good faith belief that the materials listed below are not authorized by the
above IP Owner, it's agent, or the law and therefore infringe upon the IP
Owner's rights.  I believe that cashed copies of the web site
http:///www.topsecretrecipes.net are hosted on one or more of your server(s)
at The Planet.com

Infringing material:
 1)  http://www.topsecretrecipes.net
The use of our registered trademark "Top Secret Recipes" Serial number
78/220,879 as the URL and title of this web site.

2)  The following recipes were created and are owned by Todd Wilbur and Top
Secret Recipes, Inc.:
